page.shortlink: api objects security object create role method

argument.name: RoleName
argument.description: The name of the role to be created.

return.name: result
return.description: Returns .T. if role is created; otherwise .F.

page.discussion: Context.Security.CreateRole() adds a role. Check *[link:Context.Security.CallResult.Success@./index.xml#section1_CallResult]* before using the return value.
